articles.title: Errant DNA triggers immune system response against cancer - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: DNA that ends up where it doesn't belong in cancer cells can unleash an immune response that makes tumors more susceptible to immunotherapy, the results of two UT Southwestern studies indicate.
